amendment.description: Amendment requires the agency to submit to Congress a report that identifies any factors that inhibit the expansion and accessibility of telemedicine services, including factors relating to telemedicine networks.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 22 printed in the Congressional Record to submit a report on telemedicine services including factors that inhibit the expansion and accessiblity of telemedicine networks.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thompson (CA) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
